title: CryptopreneurBrainboss
author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
created_time: May 25, 2022, 10:20:57 AMLast edit: June 22, 2022, 11:57:10 PM by CryptopreneurBrainboss
content: Betfury.io: the leading social bitcoin casino is looking to hire approximately 40 active participates of the community to help spread the word about their casino through your signature ad space. If you believe to be qualify for this role, drop your application below and it'll be reviewed. Don't forget to visit BetFury's ANN thread to drop your review or know more about our casino.Rules and Requirements:• You can also choose the payment currency to receive your reward in: BFG or BTC"• Applicants must have been very active in the last 30 days for your application to be considered valid.• Minimum of 10 merits in last 120 days before applying.• Wear our Signature & Avatar before or after acceptance into campaign.• Write a minimum of 20 constructive posts each week that you participate in campaign in order to receive payment.• Write a minimum of 5 constructive posts in the Gambling section each week in order to receive payment. These 5 gambling posts will count towards the 20 post Min weekly requirement.• Maximum of 5 posts (2 gambling posts included) will be eligible for daily post count.• Posts in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, any bounty/campaign threads as well as threads where your Signature isn't displayed will not count towards eligible posts.• Local boards are welcomed, 10 out of the 20 minimum posts are eligible for locals.• Users with legitimate negative feedback from a DT member aren't allowed in campaign.• Receiving a legitimate negative feedback from a DT member gets you removed automatically without pay from campaign.• Alt accounts aren't welcomed in campaign, abusers caught will be punished with red tag and no payment.• Removal of signature/avatar within the week results to no payment.• Each payment will be sent directly to your bech32 BTC address by Betfury's Team on Thursday between 1-3 PM. (Week will run from 12:00 AM Thursday ends Wednesday 10:00 PM (Forum time).This Campaign will be open for Full Members +.• BetFury.io reserves the right to stop or alter this campaign at any time.Payouts and Positions:15x Full Members - $40/week10x Sr. Members - $50/week15x Hero/Legendary Members - $70/week Application Format:Code: Bitcointalk Username:Current post count (Including this one):bech32 BTC Address:Merit in the last 120 days:“You can also choose the payment currency to receive your reward in: BFG or BTC"Avatar :Link : https://imgur.com/MVlPidA SignaturesHero Members
